snippet.title: Eastern Exorcist [PS4/PC] Steam Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Eastern Exorcist is a brutal melee-based 2D RPG/combat game playing out in a hand-drawn 2D environment.


More details here: https://worthplaying.com/game/14189/



Eastern Exorcist is available through Steam Early Access ( https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120810/Eastern_Exorcist/ ) for $16.99, with a 20% launch week discount.


Eastern Exorcist is in development for PC (Steam) and PS4.



#EasternExorcist #videogames #WorthPlaying #WorthPlayingvideos
